info.description:
Shown in Almeida Fabric in Parchment.

OVERVIEW
Introducing a chic new sofa that fits perfectly into the casual coastal category. The Greenwich is both plush and inviting due to its plump cushioning of durable foam cores and soft outer layers. This level of comfort is matched by the sofa’s intrinsic elegance, which is characterised by a graceful skirt and a gentle fluting of rolled armrests.

Tailored in softly textured and chunky weave linen-look polyester, the Greenwich is just the place to take a catnap and dream about holidays by the sea.
 
“The slub weave fabric in soft driftwood colours gives this comfy sofa its contemporary beach-house feel,” Freedom sofa buyer.

Tailored in softly textured and chunky weave linen-look polyester, the Greenwich is just the place to take a catnap and dream about holidays by the sea.
 
“The slub weave fabric in soft driftwood colours gives this comfy sofa its contemporary beach-house feel,”  Freedom sofa buyer.
info.name: Greenwich Sofa 3S (Skirted)
